00025 ///
00026 /// @class b
00027 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00028 final class b {
00029 
00030     // our plugin instance
00031     private static $instance = false;
00032     private static $loaded = array();
00033     
00034     // what defined our core
00035     private static $core = array(
00036     
00037         // general 
00038         'config'    => "./bolt/config.php",
00039         'dao'       => "./bolt/dao.php",
00040         'route'     => "./bolt/route.php",
00041         'render'    => "./bolt/render.php",
00042         'cookie'    => "./bolt/cookie.php",
00043         'session'   => "./bolt/session.php",
00044         'source'    => "./bolt/source.php",
00045

00047         'source-mongo'     => "./bolt/source/mongo.php",        
00048

00057     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00058     /// @brief magic static to execute plugins. passthrough to
00059     ///         plugin::call method
00060     ///
00061     /// @see plugin::call
00062     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00063     public static function __callStatic($name, $args) {
00064         if (!self::$instance) {
00065             self::$instance = new bolt();
00066         }
00067         return call_user_func(array(self::$instance, 'call'), $name, $args);
00068     }
00069     
00070     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00071     /// @brief static method to register a plugin. passthrough
00072     ///                 to plugin::plug method
00073     ///
00074     /// @see plugin::plug
00075     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00076     public static function plug() {
00077         if (!self::$instance) {
00078             self::$instance = new bolt();
00079         }
00080         return call_user_func_array(array(self::$instance, 'plug'), func_get_args());
00081     }
00082 
00083     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00084     /// @brief initalize the bolt framework
00085     ///
00086     /// @param $args initalization arguments
00087     ///               - core: array of core plugins to load
00088     ///               - config: array of config params to set
00089     ///               - load: array of plugin folders to load. glob
00090     ///                         is run on each item
00091     /// @return void
00092     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00093     public static function init($args=array()) {
00094     
00095         // if no core
00096         if (!array_key_exists('core', $args)) {
00097             $args['core'] = array_keys(self::$core);
00098         }
00099     
00100         // we need to include all of our core
00101         // plugins
00102         foreach (self::$core as $name => $file) {
00103             
00104             // see if it's relative
00105             if (substr($file,0,2) == './') { $file = bRoot."/{$file}"; }
00106             
00107             // make sure they want us to load it
00108             if (!in_array($name, $args['core'])) { continue; }
00109             
00110             // include it, only one
00111             include_once($file);
00112             
00113         }
00114     
00115         // config
00116         if (isset($args['config'])) {
00117             b::config($args['config']);
00118         }
00119         
00120         // load
00121         if (isset($args['load'])) {
00122             foreach($args['load'] as $pattern) {
00123             
00124                 // is it a file
00125                 if (stripos($pattern, '.php') !== false)  {
00126                     $files = array($pattern);
00127                 }
00128                 else {
00129                     $files = glob($pattern);            
00130                 }
00131                 
00132                 // loop through each file
00133                 foreach ($files as $file) {
00134                 
00135                     // load it 
00136                     include($file);
00137                     
00138                     // loaded
00139                     self::$loaded[] = $file;
00140                     
00141                 }
00142                 
00143             }
00144         }
00145     
00146     }

00149     /// @brief static return a list of loaded files
00150     ///
00151     /// @return array of loaded files
00152     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00153     public static function getLoaded() {
00154         return self::$loaded;

00157     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00158     /// @brief autoload bolt components
00159     ///
00160     /// @param $class class name to load (namespace allowed)
00161     /// @return void
00162     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00163     public static function autoloader($class) { 
00164       
00165       // we only want the last part of the class
00166       $class = str_replace('\\', "/", $class);
00167       
00168         // see if the file exists in root
00169         if (file_exists(bRoot."/{$class}.php")) {
00170             return include_once(bRoot."/{$class}.php");
00171         }
00172     
00173         // config
00174         $autoload = b::config()->autoload;
00175         
00176         // if autoload
00177         if (is_array($autoload)) {
00178             foreach ($autoload as $root) {
00179                 if (is_callable($root)) {
00180                     return call_user_func($root, $class);
00181                 }
00182                 else if (file_exists($root.$class.".php")) {
00183                     return include_once($root.$class.".php");
00184                 }
00185             }        
00186         }
00187     
00188     }

00244 final class bolt extends bolt\plugin {
00245     
00246     ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00247     /// @brief construct a new bolt class. must also construct
00248     ///         parent class and pass fallback class list

00264 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00265 /// @brief global paramater check
00266 ///
00267 /// @method p
00268 /// @param  $key  key name
00269 /// @param  $default  default value if key != exist [Default: false]
00270 /// @param  $array    array to look in [Default: $_REQUEST]
00271 /// @param  $filter    string to filter on the return
00272 /// @return mixed paramater value
00273 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00274 function  p($key, $default=false, $array=false, $filter=FILTER_SANITIZE_STRING) {
00275 
00276   // check if key is an array
00277   if ( is_array($key) ) {
00278   
00279     // alawys 
00280     $key = $key['key'];
00281     
00282     // check for other stuff
00283     $default = p('default',false,$key);
00284     $array = p('array',false,$key);
00285     $filter = p('filter',false,$key);
00286     
00287   }
00288   
00289   // no array
00290   if ( $array === false ) {
00291     $array = $_REQUEST;
00292   }
00293   
00294   // if there's a .
00295   if ( strpos($key, '.') !== false ) {
00296     
00297     // split on the .
00298     list($a, $k) = explode('.', $key);
00299         
00300     // reset array as p(a);
00301     $array = p($a, array(), false, $filter);
00302     
00303     // reset key
00304     $key = $k;
00305     
00306   }
00307   
00308   // not an array
00309   if ( !is_array($array) OR $key === false ){ return false; }
00310 
00311   
00312   // check 
00313   if ( !array_key_exists($key,$array) OR $array[$key] === "" OR $array[$key] === false OR $array[$key] === 'false' ) {
00314     return $default;
00315   } 
00316 
00317   
00318   // if final is an array,
00319   // weand filter we need to filter each el   
00320   if ( is_array($array[$key]) ) {
00321     
00322     // filter
00323     array_walk($array[$key],function($item,$key,$a){
00324       $item = p($key,$a[1],$a[0]);
00325     },array($filter,$array[$key]));
00326 
00327   }
00328   else {
00329   
00330     // array
00331     $array[$key] = filter_var($array[$key], $filter);
00332     
00333     // still bad
00334     if (!$array[$key]) {
00335       return $default;
00336     }
00337     
00338   }
00339   
00340   // reutnr
00341   return $array[$key];
00342 
00343 }
00344 
00345 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00346 /// @brief global raw paramater check
00347 ///
00348 /// @method p_raw
00349 /// @param  $key  key name
00350 /// @param  $default  default value if key != exist [Default: false]
00351 /// @param  $array    array to look in [Default: $_REQUEST]
00352 /// @return mixed paratamer value
00353 /// @see p 
00354 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00355 function p_raw($key,$default=false,$array=false) {
00356   return p($key,$default,$array,FILTER_UNSAFE_RAW);
00357 }

00359 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00360 /// @brief global path paramater check
00361 /// @method p
00362 /// @param  $pos      index position of key
00363 /// @param  $default  default value if key != exist [Default: false]
00364 /// @param  $array    array to look in [Default: $_REQUEST]
00365 /// @param  $filter    string to filter on the return
00366 /// @return mixed path paramter
00367 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00368 function pp($pos,$default=false,$filter=false) {
00369     
00370   // path
00371   $path = bPath;
00372   
00373   if ( !$path ) { return $default; }
00374   
00375   // path 
00376   $path = explode('/',trim($path,'/'));
00377   
00378   // yes?
00379   if ( count($path)-1 < $pos OR ( count($path)-1 >= $pos AND $path[$pos] == "" ) ) {
00380     return $default;
00381   }
00382 
00383   // filter
00384   if ( $filter ) {
00385     $path[$pos] = preg_replace("/[^".$filter."]+/","",$path[$pos]);
00386   }
00387   
00388   // give back
00389   return $path[$pos];
00390 
00391 }

00393 // get the file name
00394 $path = explode("/",$_SERVER['SCRIPT_FILENAME']);
00395 
00396 // need to get base tree
00397 $uri = explode('/',$_SERVER['SCRIPT_NAME']);  
00398 
00399 // define 
00400 if ( isset($_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']) ) {
00401 
00402     // forward
00403     if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_HOST'])) {
00404       $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST'] = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_HOST'];
00405     }
00406     
00407     // forward
00408     if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'])) {
00409       $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR'] = $_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_FOR'];
00410     }
00411 
00412     if (isset($_SERVER['HTTP_X_FORWARDED_PROTO']) == 'https') {
00413         $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT'] = 443;
00414     }
00415     
00416     define("HTTP_HOST",    $_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']);
00417     define("HOST",         ($_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']==443?"https://":"http://").$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']);
00418     define("HOST_NSSL",    "http://".$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']);
00419     define("HOST_SSL",       "https://".$_SERVER['HTTP_HOST']);
00420     define("URI",          HOST.implode("/",array_slice($uri,0,-1))."/");
00421     define("URI_NSSL",     HOST_NSSL.implode("/",array_slice($uri,0,-1))."/");
00422     define("URI_SSL",      HOST_SSL.implode("/",array_slice($uri,0,-1))."/");
00423     define("COOKIE_DOMAIN",  false);
00424     define("IP",       $_SERVER['REMOTE_ADDR']);
00425     define("SELF",       HOST.$_SERVER['REQUEST_URI']);
00426     define("PORT",       $_SERVER['SERVER_PORT']);
00427     
00428     // our path
00429     define("bPath",         (getenv("REDIRECT_bPath")?getenv("REDIRECT_bPath"):getenv("bPath")));
00430     
00431 }
00432 else {
00433 
00434     define("HTTP_HOST",    false);
00435     define("HOST",         false);
00436     define("HOST_NSSL",    false);
00437     define("HOST_SSL",       false);
00438     define("URI_NSSL",     false);
00439     define("URI_SSL",      false);
00440     define("COOKIE_DOMAIN",  false);
00441     define("IP",       false);
00442     define("SELF",       false);
00443     define("PORT",       false);
00444 
00445     if (!defined("URI")) {
00446         define("URI", false); 
00447     }
00448 
00449 }
